inclusive.title: Inclusive or Exclusive
inclusive.text:
A character motion is either inclusive or exclusive.
When inclusive, the start and end position of the motion are included in the operation.
When exclusive, the last character towards the end of the buffer is not included.
Linewise motions always include the start and end position.

exclusive.title: Inclusive or Exclusive
exclusive.text:
A character motion is either inclusive or exclusive.
When inclusive, the start and end position of the motion are included in the operation.
When exclusive, the last character towards the end of the buffer is not included.
Linewise motions always include the start and end position.
